1.0.name: wordpress/frame-webstore-shopping-cart-toolbar
1.0.description:
A Shopping Cart Toolbar that connects your website with visitors like never before. Create a Frame Webstore in seconds to engage & generate more revenue from your online audience.
  • Earn more revenue and sales from your website.
  • No coding required. Boost website traffic and engagement by 35%.
  • Your Products are always visible on every page.
  • Build hype with Coupon's and Discounts.
  • Accept HTTPS safe and secure payments with PayPal.
  • Share products on Facebook and Twitter.
  • Real-time online chat for website visitors.
    • view a live demo here: http://www.framewebstore.com
